To the kind attention of: ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT
Dear ${object.partner_id.name or 'customer'},

We would like to take your kind attention on the following :

Invoice #${object.name}
Due Date${object.deadline if object.deadline else '/'}
Amount${object.total} ${object.currency_id.name}

Your on time payment will be appreciated.
In case, for any reason, the payment will be delayd we kindly ask you to previously inform our accounting department at: ${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.email or 'openerp@micronaet.it'}
Best regards


${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name}
Accounting Dept.

(This communication is automatically generated by ${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name} Accounting monitoring system)
${"1st Reminder of payment for overdue %s invoice #%s" % (object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name, object.name)}

To the kind attention of: ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT
Dear ${object.partner_id.name or 'customer'},

We would kindly remind you that the due payment date of our invoice # ${object.name} was ${object.deadline if object.deadline else '/'}

As till now we have not received the bank transfer neither any communication about the faulty payment, we are asking you to process the payment as soon as possible and to send us the notification of swift.
We thank you in advance for your collaboration on this matter. Best regards


${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name}
Accounting Dept.

(This communication is automatically generated by ${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name} Accounting monitoring system)
${"2nd Reminder of payment for overdue %s invoice #%s" % (object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name, object.name)}

To the kind attention of: ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT
Dear ${object.partner_id.name or 'customer'},

This is the 2nd reminder that the due payment date of our invoice # ${object.name} was ${object.deadline if object.deadline else '/'}

As till now we have not received the bank transfer neither any communication about the faulty payment, we are asking you to process the payment as soon as possible and to send us the notification of swift.
We thank you in advance for your collaboration on this matter. Best regards


${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name}
Accounting Dept.

(This communication is automatically generated by ${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name} Accounting monitoring system)
${"3rd and last reminder of payment of %s invoice #%s" % (object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name, object.name)}

To the kind attention of: ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT
Dear ${object.partner_id.name or 'customer'},

Despite our 1st and 2nd reminder that the due payment date of our invoice #${object.name} was ${object.deadline if object.deadline else '/'} we have not received the bank transfer neither any communication about the faulty payment.

Here we are notifying you that if the payment will not be settled in the next 15 days, we will be forced to proceed to a legal action.
We fairly hope to receiving the payment in time. Best regards


${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name}
Accounting Dept.

(This communication is automatically generated by ${object.partner_id.company_id.partner_id.name} Accounting monitoring system)
